## Load libraries

```{r load libaries, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Load Household-level Data
```{r load hh data, message=FALSE}
hh_data <- read_csv("household_data_me.csv")
```

## Distribution of a continuous variable (household income over the past 12 months)

### Summary Statistics

```{r summary statistics, message=FALSE}
HINCP_Summary <- summary(hh_data$HINCP)

HINCP_Summary
```

### Standard Deviation
```{r standard deviation, message=FALSE}
sd(hh_data$HINCP)
```

### 95% Confidence Interval
```{r 95 confidence interval, message=FALSE}
conf_int <- t.test(hh_data$HINCP)
```
